attributes.action: Ensure Individuals have access to the European fund to promote awareness of environmental issues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the European fund is not available as a source of funding to help individuals start business in Wales. There are many individuals who can provide a quality service in their own right to the UK, especially within training on environmental awareness issues. These individuals can not start their business as they can get no access to funding. Help to release some of this money to individuals who can meet criteria and provide this valuable service
